entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bridgewater
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 this morning. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast.
